vogar.target

Class TestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.target.TestRunner

  • public final class TestRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs an action, in process on the target.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProperties

        private java.util.Properties loadProperties()

      • useSocketMonitor

        public void useSocketMonitor()
        Configure this test runner to await an incoming socket connection when writing test results. Otherwise all communication happens over System.out.

      • getPropertiesStream

        private java.io.InputStream getPropertiesStream()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Attempt to load the test properties file from both the application and system classloader. This is necessary because sometimes we run tests from the boot classpath.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runnerClass

        private java.lang.Class<?> runnerClass(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
        Returns the class to run the test with based on . For instance, a class that extends junit.framework.TestCase should be run with JUnitSpec. Returns null if no such associated runner exists.

         throws java.io.IOException
